overview: "World Class Performer' EXO KAl holds a solo concert consisting of his own identity through world's first online  concert 'Beyond LIVE',  Specifically, as the concert title 'KLoor', which is a combination of KAl's name and Floor that represents the stage, consists  of the meaning that the stage is where KAl's unrivaled identity is shown. This concert will be catching the eye with stages that  combine cinematic effects such as motion capture, hologram, and chroma key as well as directing that crosses space under the concept of 'teleportation' which is KAl's superpower. (cr: @KaiNationUnion_)
title: KAI : KLoor
